QuestData.Title: Spy vs Spy
QuestData.Description:
Nathrezim. Dreadlords. The Unseen Guests.
Call them what you will, they are a race that was crafted to be the greatest collection of spies and infiltrators in all of reality, once upon a time.
Their intrusion has underestimated three things. Kael'thas Sunstrider, Baroness Vashj, and $n!
I have brought a tool Kael'thas and I used to detect nathrezim when we served under Illidan. And I am the matron of spies!
Let us hunt these intruders down.
QuestData.LogDescription: Track down and defeat $1oa Dreadlord Infiltrators.
